title: A pastoral letter writ by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert, Lord Bishop of Sarum, to the clergy of his diocess, concerning the oaths of allegiance and supremacy to K. William and Q. Mary
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Printed for J. Starkey and Ric. Chiswell,
notes: "This letter ... gave such offence to some persons ... in Parliament, that it was ... ordered to be burned by the hands of the common executioner, in 1693."  Cf. Lowndes, Bibliographer's manual of English literature.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
